analysisComplete: Analysis complete! Review the suggested values below.
analysisError: Could not analyze the photo. You can try again or fill in the details manually.
quotaLimitReached: You've used all 6 AI analyses for today. You can still enter details manually.
quotaRemaining: {count, plural, one {# scan} other {# scans}} remaining
chatError: Could not send message. Please try again.
entryType: What kind of moment would you like to capture?
location: Where and with whom were you?
foodEaten: What did you eat or drink?
behavior: Was there anything special about this moment?
complete: Well done! Your moment has been saved.
switchToForm: Prefer to fill it in yourself?
deleteConfirm: Delete this moment? This action cannot be undone.
bookmark: Do you want to save this moment?
